# Load packages 
```{r packages, message =FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# data calling & wrangling 
library(here)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(tibble)
library(stringr)
library(data.table)

# visualization
library(ggplot2)
library(jtools)
library(ggstance)
library(broom.mixed)
library(gridExtra)
library(cowplot)
```

# Load data 

Call summer crane 5A tracking data
```{r call summer 5A tracking data}
# call the data
summer <- read_rds(here("data","summer_filtered.Rdata")) # 2015-16 centroids data 

# filter out the individual 5A per yr
summer15_5a <- summer %>% filter(id=="5A") %>% filter(timestamp > "2015-06-20 00:00:00" & timestamp < "2015-09-22 23:59:59")
summer16_5a <- summer %>% filter(id=="5A") %>% filter(timestamp > "2016-06-20 00:00:00" & timestamp < "2016-09-22 23:59:59")
summer17_5a <- summer %>% filter(id=="5A") %>% filter(timestamp > "2017-06-20 00:00:00" & timestamp < "2017-09-22 23:59:59")
summer18_5a <- summer %>% filter(id=="5A") %>% filter(timestamp > "2018-06-20 00:00:00" & timestamp < "2018-09-22 23:59:59")
summer19_5a <- summer %>% filter(id=="5A") %>% filter(timestamp > "2019-06-20 00:00:00" & timestamp < "2019-09-22 23:59:59")
summer20_5a <- summer %>% filter(id=="5A") %>% filter(timestamp > "2020-06-20 00:00:00" & timestamp < "2020-09-22 23:59:59")

# row bind them together as one df 
summer_5A <- rbind(summer15_5a, summer16_5a, summer17_5a, summer18_5a, summer19_5a, summer20_5a)

# facotrize the year column
summer_5A$year <- as.factor(summer_5A$year)

# check the data 
summary(summer_5A)
```

Call SSF fitted estimates data 
```{r SSF fitted estimates data}
# call the fitted data 
fit <- read_rds(here("data", "5A_summer_estimates.Rdata"))

# check 
summary(fit)
```

Call used/avail data by year 
```{r used avail data per yer }
# call the filltered data 
used.avail <- read_rds(here("data", "summer_trk15_5A_avil_used_pts.Rdata"))

#check 
summary(used.avail)
```


# Visualization
```{r visualization, fig.width= 4, fig.height= 4}
# ggplot color palette
colors <- c("2015"= "#661100","2016"="#0072B2" ,"2017"= "#D55E00","2018"= "#CC79A7","2019"="#E69F00", "2020"="#999933")

# a) tracking visualization 
fig.a = ggplot(data=summer_5A, aes(x=long, y=lat, color = year, alpha = year))+
  geom_point()+
  xlab("Longtitude")+
  ylab("Latitude")+
  theme(text=element_text(size=12))+
  scale_colour_manual("Year", values =  colors, labels = c("2015","2016","2017","2018","2019","2020"))+
  scale_alpha_manual("category", values = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1), guide = "none")+
  ggtitle("(a) Crane 5A summer locations")

fig.a

# b) estimate visualization
fig.b = fit %>% dplyr::mutate(beta = forcats::fct_relevel(beta, sort)) %>% 
ggplot(., aes(coefficient, beta, color = factor(year))) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, lty=2, lwd=1, colour = "grey50")+
  geom_point(size = 3, pch = 20, position = position_dodge(width = 0.5))+
  geom_linerange(aes(xmax = highCI, xmin = lowCI))+
  scale_colour_manual("Year", values =  colors, labels = c("2015","2016","2017","2018","2019","2020"))+
  xlim(-5, 5)+
  theme_bw()+
  facet_grid(~ year)+
  xlab("Effect size")+
  theme(legend.position = "none", axis.title.y = element_blank())+
  ggtitle("(b) SSF Parameter estimates")

fig.b

# c) distribution of used/avail points per year 
fig.c = ggplot(used.avail, aes(x = as.factor(ODprev), group = case_))+
        geom_bar(position = position_dodge(), aes(fill = case_), stat = "count")+
        scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Paired")+
        labs(y = "Count", fill = "Used", x = "OD of previous year")+
        facet_wrap(~year, scales = "free")+
        ggtitle("(c) Distribution of used and available points in previous year's OD")

fig.c
```

combine the plots 
```{r combine the plots}
# combine the figures 
grid <- plot_grid(fig.a, fig.b, fig.c, nrow = 3, rel_heights = c(1/2.5, 1/2.5, 1/2))


#grid <- grid.arrange(fig.a, fig.b, fig.c, nrow = 3, ncol = 1)

grid
```

save the used landcover plot 
```{r save the plot}
ggsave("fig2.png", grid, width = 7, height = 10, dpi = 700, bg = NA)
```
